verses.roman:
bhāvite bhāvite śīghra āilā nīlācale
āsi' uttarilā haridāsa-vāsā-sthale

synonyms: bhāvite bhāvite—thinking and thinking; śīghra—very soon; āilā nīlācale—reached Nīlācala (Jagannātha Purī); āsi'-coming; uttarilā—approached; haridāsa-vāsā-sthale—the place where Haridāsa Ṭhākura was residing.
translation: Thus absorbed in thought, he quickly reached Jagannātha Purī. When he arrived, he approached the hut of Haridāsa Ṭhākura.
